official_title: To include Nelson County and Franklin County, Virginia, in the Appalachian region for purposes of the programs of the Appalachian Regional Commission.

summary.text: Includes Franklin County and Nelson County, Virginia, in the Appalachian region for purposes of provisions regarding Appalachian regional development.

titles.title: To include Nelson County and Franklin County, Virginia, in the Appalachian region for purposes of the programs of the Appalachian Regional Commission.
